message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. Let's be reasonable.
Come on, meet me in the middle
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it
Look, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome.  Agree to this and we both walk away with something.
